page.title: 01MISCELLANEOUS INFORMATION
page.content: THE WESTERN PART OF THE BLOCK IS A SUBURB OF CHELTENHAM, SURROUNDING WHAT WAS FORMERLY THE OLD VILLAGE OF CHARLTON KINGS. THE OLD HOUSING IS NOW OUTNUMBERED BY A LOT OF POST-WAR DEVELOPMENT, BUT IS STILL EVIDENT BY THE PARISH CHURCH AND AT RYEWORTH.THE OLD VILLAGE CENTRE NOW HAS A MODERN LIBRARY,SUPERMARKET AND PEDESTRIAN SHOPPING PRECINCT. EAST OF THE TOWN ,THE COTSWOLD ESCARPMENT IS BROKEN BY THE A40 TRUNK ROAD WHICH RUNS EASTWARDS THROUGH FIELDS AND ISOLATED FARMS.THE POPULATION IS A MIX OF SOCIAL LEVELS AND OCCUPATIONS,BOTH RURAL AND INDUSTRIAL. THE AREA IS CONSIDERED TO BE A DESIRABLE, RESIDENTIAL PART OF CHELTENHAM. INFLATED HOUSE PRICES REFLECT THIS.
